mapper.select: select employee_id, employee_name, employee_password, employee_online, employee_last_login_time from employee

SELECT employee.employee_id, employee.employee_name, employee.employee_password, employee.employee_online, employee.employee_last_login_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_id, employee_detail.employee_detail_gender, employee_detail.employee_detail_birthday, employee_detail.employee_detail_address, employee_detail.employee_detail_phone, employee_detail.employee_detail_identity, employee_detail.employee_detail_entry_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_email, employee_detail.employee_detail_descript, employee_detail.employee_detail_status, employee_detail.employee_id, employee_detail.position_id, employee_detail.branch_id, employee_detail.title_id, FROM employee , employee_detail WHERE employee.employee_id = employee_detail.employee_id AND employee_detail.employee_id = #{employeeId}

SELECT employee.employee_id, employee.employee_name, employee.employee_password, employee.employee_online, employee.employee_last_login_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_id, employee_detail.employee_detail_gender, employee_detail.employee_detail_birthday, employee_detail.employee_detail_address, employee_detail.employee_detail_phone, employee_detail.employee_detail_identity, employee_detail.employee_detail_entry_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_email, employee_detail.employee_detail_descript, employee_detail.employee_detail_status, employee_detail.employee_id, employee_detail.position_id, employee_detail.branch_id, employee_detail.title_id, title.title_name FROM employee , employee_detail, title WHERE employee.employee_id = employee_detail.employee_id AND title.title_id=employee_detail.title_id employee_detail.employee_id = #{employeeId}

SELECT employee.employee_id, employee.employee_name, employee.employee_password, employee.employee_online, employee.employee_last_login_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_id, employee_detail.employee_detail_gender, employee_detail.employee_detail_birthday, employee_detail.employee_detail_address, employee_detail.employee_detail_phone, employee_detail.employee_detail_identity, employee_detail.employee_detail_entry_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_email, employee_detail.employee_detail_descript, employee_detail.employee_detail_status, employee_detail.employee_id, employee_detail.position_id, employee_detail.branch_id, employee_detail.title_id FROM employee, employee_detail, `position`, title WHERE employee.employee_id = employee_detail.employee_id AND employee_detail.position_id = `position`.position_id AND employee_detail.title_id = title.title_id AND employee_detail.employee_detail_status = 1 AND employee_detail.position_id = ( SELECT `position`.position_id FROM `position` WHERE `position`.position_name = '医师' ) AND ( title.title_id = 2 OR title.title_id = 1 )

SELECT e.employee_id, e.employee_name, e.employee_password, e.employee_online, e.employee_last_login_time, r.role_id, r.role_name, pd.power_detail_name, pd.power_detail_status, pd.power_detail_method, pd.power_detail_url, pd.power_detail_description, pd.power_id, pd.power_detail_id FROM employee AS e LEFT JOIN employee_role AS er ON e.employee_id = er.employee_id LEFT JOIN role AS r ON er.role_id = r.role_id LEFT JOIN role_power AS rp ON r.role_id = rp.role_id LEFT JOIN power AS p ON rp.power_id = p.power_id LEFT JOIN power_detail AS pd ON p.power_id = pd.power_id WHERE e.employee_id =#{employeeId}

SELECT employee.employee_id, employee.employee_name, employee.employee_password, employee.employee_online, employee.employee_last_login_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_id, employee_detail.employee_detail_gender, employee_detail.employee_detail_birthday, employee_detail.employee_detail_address, employee_detail.employee_detail_phone, employee_detail.employee_detail_identity, employee_detail.employee_detail_entry_time, employee_detail.employee_detail_email, employee_detail.employee_detail_descript, employee_detail.employee_detail_status, employee_detail.employee_id, employee_detail.position_id, employee_detail.branch_id, title.title_name FROM employee , employee_detail, title WHERE employee.employee_id = employee_detail.employee_id AND title.title_id=employee_detail.title_id and employee_detail.employee_detail_status=#{employeeDetailStatus}
mapper.insert: insert into employee(employee_name, employee_password, employee_online, employee_last_login_time) values (#{employeeName}, #{employeePassword}, #{employeeOnline}, #{employeeLastLoginTime})
mapper.update:
update employee
employee_name = #{employeeName},
employee_password = #{employeePassword},
employee_online = #{employeeOnline},
employee_last_login_time = #{employeeLastLoginTime},
where employee_id = #{employeeId}

update e
e.employee_name = #{employeeName},
e.employee_password = #{employeePassword},
e.employee_online = #{employeeOnline},
e.employee_last_login_time = #{employeeLastLoginTime},
ed.employee_detail_gender = #{employeeDetail.employeeDetailGender},
ed.employee_detail_birthday = #{employeeDetail.employeeDetailBirthday},
ed.employee_detail_address = #{employeeDetail.employeeDetailAddress},
ed.employee_detail_phone = #{employeeDetail.employeeDetailPhone},
ed.employee_detail_identity = #{employeeDetail.employeeDetailIdentity},
ed.employee_detail_entry_time = #{employeeDetail.employeeDetailEntryTime},
ed.employee_detail_email = #{employeeDetail.employeeDetailEmail},
ed.employee_detail_descript = #{employeeDetail.employeeDetailDescript},
ed.employee_detail_status = #{employeeDetail.employeeDetailStatus},
from employee e join employee_detail ed on e.employee_id=ed.employee_id where e.employee_id=#{employeeId}
